verses.text: \w In|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elishama, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* member \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w family|strong="H2233"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w chief|strong="H7227"\w* \w officers|strong="H7227"\w*, \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam \w at|strong="H2320"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* ate \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w meal|strong="H3899"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam, \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, \w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w killing|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* whom \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* govern \w the|strong="H5221"\w* land.

\w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w also|strong="H3458"\w* \w killed|strong="H5221"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H4421"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w at|strong="H4421"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* well \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Chaldean \f + \fr 41:3 \ft Or Babylonian\f* \w soldiers|strong="H4421"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* murder \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w*,

\w eighty|strong="H8084"\w* men \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w shaved|strong="H1548"\w* \w off|strong="H1548"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w beards|strong="H2206"\w*, \w torn|strong="H7167"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* garments, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H1413"\w* themselves \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, carrying grain \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*, \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w*. \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* encountered \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w Come|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam.”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H5892"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w slaughtered|strong="H7819"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* threw \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cistern.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* men \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H3426"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w hidden|strong="H4301"\w* \w treasure|strong="H4301"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*—\w wheat|strong="H2406"\w*, \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*!” \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w refrained|strong="H2308"\w* \w from|strong="H8432"\w* \w killing|strong="H4191"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w* \w with|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* others.

\w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cistern \w into|strong="H6213"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w thrown|strong="H7993"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bodies|strong="H6297"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w along|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* large \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Asa \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w took|strong="H7617"\w* \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*—\w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w along|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w others|strong="H5971"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*—\w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w whom|strong="H5971"\w* \w Nebuzaradan|strong="H5018"\w* \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam. \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w took|strong="H7617"\w* \w them|strong="H7617"\w* \w captive|strong="H7617"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w set|strong="H6485"\w* \w off|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*. Johanan Rescues the Captives

\w When|strong="H8085"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w armies|strong="H2428"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w crimes|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w had|strong="H1121"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w*,

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*,

But \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Geruth|strong="H1628"\w* \w Chimham|strong="H3643"\w*, near \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* order \w to|strong="H3212"\w* proceed \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*

\w to|strong="H6440"\w* escape \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.\f + \fr 41:18 \ft That is, the Babylonians\f* \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahikam, \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*.
